title: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
shortDescription: These colorful quinoa stuffed bell peppers make a nutritious and delicious meal. Packed with protein and veggies!
fullDescription: These colorful quinoa stuffed bell peppers make a nutritious and delicious meal. The combination of protein-rich quinoa, fresh vegetables, and flavorful seasonings creates a satisfying dish that's both healthy and flavorful. Serve it as a main course or as a side dish.

ingredients.name: bell peppers
ingredients.preparation: cut off the tops and remove seeds

instructionGroups.label: For the stuffed bell peppers
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn kernels, red onion, cherry tomatoes, fresh parsley, olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper. Mix well.
Stuff the mixture into the bell peppers.
Place the stuffed bell peppers in a baking dish.
Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the peppers are tender.

tips: Feel free to add your favorite vegetables or spices to the stuffing mixture.
For a cheesy flavor, sprinkle nutritional yeast or vegan cheese on top of the stuffed peppers before baking.
These stuffed bell peppers can be refrigerated and enjoyed as leftovers the next day.
